name: bolt-manager-01-02
description: Demo manageriale calcistica realizzata con Bolt.new

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp src/index.html build/ && cp src/main.js build/ && cp src/style.css build/ && cp -r bolt_src build/bolt_src && mkdir -p build/pages && cp bolt_src/pages/*.page.js build/pages/
scripts.dev: echo 'No dev server. Run build instead.'
